channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Fishcake tacos with mango, lime and cumin yoghurt
item.description:
Fishcake tacos with mango, lime and cumin yoghurt



Making tacos is a really easy and fun way to feed friends. You can prepare everything well in advance - the fishcake mixture (uncooked), the yoghurt, the onion and mango pickle can all be made a day ahead and kept separate in the fridge - then just hop to the stove 5 minutes before everyone wants to eat, cook the fishcakes and heat the tacos. Reheat any leftovers the next day. The dish also works well without the tacos, if you want to eat with a knife and fork..

item.title: Vegetarian sausage cassoulet
item.description:
Vegetarian sausage cassoulet



Cassoulet is a rich and hearty dish that is traditionally slow-cooked and made with meat. In this recipe, however, we've halved the time and opted for Linda McCartney sausages for a delicious vegetarian treat that's packed with wholesome flavour..

item.title: Vegetarian casserole
item.description:
Vegetarian casserole



A Mediterranean one-pot stew with peppers, courgettes, lentils, sweet smoked paprika and thyme.

item.title: Very easy lamb with red wine gravy
item.description:
Very easy lamb with red wine gravy



This is a very simple supper that can be knocked together in no time. Cook as many chops us you need-cutlets will take a little less time. The red wine and redcurrant gravy is so easy that you might as well make the whole quantity even if you are serving fewer than four people..

item.title: Za'atar chicken & new potato bake with tzatziki
item.description:
Za'atar chicken & new potato bake with tzatziki



Squidgy roast new potatoes, crispy chicken skin, big dollops of fresh tzatziki, all in one dish. Bish Bash Bosh..
